headlines.description: Fulham's second half performance troubled Chelsea but could not score against Chelsea on Claudio Ranieri's return to Stamford Bridge.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chelsea weather Fulham storm to win derby

headlines.description: Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang scored twice as Arsenal came from behind to beat Tottenham 4-2 in a thrilling North London derby at the Emirates.
headlines.shortLinkText: Arsenal beat Tottenham 4-2 in thrilling derby

headlines.description: Liverpool snatched a dramatic late win against Merseyside rivals thanks to a bizarre 96th minute goal from forgotten man Divock Origi.
headlines.shortLinkText: Origi snatches dramatic derby win for Liverpool
